name: MylesBot,byRaceryVirtualRaces
0:
”Alexa start Myles Bot!”
”Alexa tell Myles Bot I ran 5 kilometers”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: myles bot
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Log your miles, human striver, so I can tally them and give you some warm applause with my robot hands. 

Every time you log miles, I calculate for you a new mileage total, and commend your robust achievements like longest run or longest streak. 

No competition, just group fun and lots of motivation!
